response.overview: More then forty years have been gone since the day in which Jole Ruglioni founded in 1972 La Casa dei Bambini – Childrens’ House, one of the first Montessori's school in Milan. For four decades the rooms, the walls, the creaking stairs og the 19th century house have welcomed little guests. Now the house isn't anymore a school it is a private house: walls, rooms have been destroyed, so the stairs too, heart of the school is not anymore there. By the way for a lot of people, pupils and parents the Building of Porpora street will remain the Montessori school of Jole. the film tells about the last months of activity before moving. Among learning, playing, pass, present and future the school daily school life and the founder's memories. It is a personal and intimate journey in the universe of childhood.
response.title: La zona oscura - L'età bambina
